data.name: Online Adult Content Manager - Favourites Links Extension
data.detailed_description:
Double the storage capacity of the "Favourites" section with the Online Adult Content Manager - Favourites Links Extension DLC!

This optional DLC adds an extra 5 pages to the "Favourites" section, doubling the capacity from 50 links to 100 links!
data.about_the_game:
Double the storage capacity of the "Favourites" section with the Online Adult Content Manager - Favourites Links Extension DLC!

This optional DLC adds an extra 5 pages to the "Favourites" section, doubling the capacity from 50 links to 100 links!
data.short_description: Double the storage capacity of the "Favourites" section with the Online Adult Content Manager - Favourites Links Extension DLC!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
